PDA1 = getPDA "testdata/test_pda_bisim_false_content_1.txt"
PDA2 = getPDA "testdata/test_pda_bisim_false_content_2.txt"

Result1 = Bisimilar (PDA1) (PDA2) !!

PDA3 = getPDA "testdata/test_pda_bisim_true_content_1.txt"
PDA4 = getPDA "testdata/test_pda_bisim_true_content_2.txt"

Result2 = Bisimilar (PDA3) (PDA4) !!

PDA5 = getPDA "testdata/test_pda_bisim_nullopt_content_1.txt"
PDA6 = getPDA "testdata/test_pda_bisim_nullopt_content_2.txt"

Result3 = Bisimilar (PDA5) (PDA6) !!
